languages.text: "Мерзкий ашмаг! Прикрывался верой в Великого, а сам тем временем просто наслаждался дарованной тебе властью!"
"Vicious ashmag! You used people's faith in the Exalted One to justify abusing the power that was given to you!"
languages.original_text: "Мерзкий ашмаг! Прикрывался верой в Великого, а сам тем временем просто наслаждался дарованной тебе властью!"

traits.locale_text: "Vicious ashmag! You used people's faith in the Exalted One to justify abusing the power that was given to you!"
"Vicious ashmag! You used people's faith in the Exalted One to justify abusing the power that was given to you!"
"Vicious ashmag! You used people's faith in the Exalted One to justify abusing the power that was given to you!"
"Vicious ashmag! You used people's faith in the Exalted One to justify abusing the power that was given to you!"
"Vicious ashmag! You used people's faith in the Exalted One to justify abusing the power that was given to you!"
"Vicious ashmag! You used people's faith in the Exalted One to justify abusing the power that was given to you!"

languages.text: « Misérable ashmag ! Vous avez abusé de votre pouvoir pour exploiter la foi des gens dans l'Exalté ! »
languages.original_text: "Vicious ashmag! You used people's faith in the Exalted One to justify abusing the power that was given to you!"

traits.locale_text: « Misérable ashmag ! Vous avez abusé de votre pouvoir pour exploiter la foi des gens dans l'Exalté ! »

languages.text: «¡Ashmag desalmado! ¡Utilizó la fe del pueblo en el Exaltado para justificar su abuso del poder que le había sido concedido!».
languages.original_text: "Vicious ashmag! You used people's faith in the Exalted One to justify abusing the power that was given to you!"

traits.locale_text: «¡Ashmag desalmado! ¡Utilizó la fe del pueblo en el Exaltado para justificar su abuso del poder que le había sido concedido!».

languages.text: 「非道なアッシュマグが！エグザルテッド・ワンへのみんなの忠誠を利用して、与えられた権力を乱用したことを正当化するなんて！」
languages.original_text: "Vicious ashmag! You used people's faith in the Exalted One to justify abusing the power that was given to you!"

traits.locale_text: 「非道なアッシュマグが！エグザルテッド・ワンへのみんなの忠誠を利用して、与えられた権力を乱用したことを正当化するなんて！」

languages.text: “这个该死的坏种！你利用大家对至高无上的神皇的信仰，为你滥用权力的行为辩护！”
languages.original_text: "Vicious ashmag! You used people's faith in the Exalted One to justify abusing the power that was given to you!"

traits.locale_text: “这个该死的坏种！你利用大家对至高无上的神皇的信仰，为你滥用权力的行为辩护！”

languages.text: "Grausamer Ashmag! Ihr habt den Glauben der Leute an den Erhabenen benutzt, um den Missbrauch der Euch übertragenen Macht zu rechtfertigen!"
languages.original_text: "Vicious ashmag! You used people's faith in the Exalted One to justify abusing the power that was given to you!"

traits.locale_text: "Grausamer Ashmag! Ihr habt den Glauben der Leute an den Erhabenen benutzt, um den Missbrauch der Euch übertragenen Macht zu rechtfertigen!"

languages.text: "Adi külboğaz! Milletin Görkemli'ye olan inancını suistimal edip sana bahşedilen kudreti kötüye kullanmışsın!"
languages.original_text: "Vicious ashmag! You used people's faith in the Exalted One to justify abusing the power that was given to you!"
